CustomField.description: The regular expression to be used to capture the endpoint, excluding version and name e.g. for services/apexrest/placeholder/v1/products/1234, the endpoint regex would be products/[0-9]*
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The regular expression to be used to capture the endpoint, excluding version and name e.g. for services/apexrest/placeholder/v1/products/1234, the endpoint regex would be products/[0-9]*
CustomField.label: Endpoint Regex
